rows.label: tlk42100111_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The other day, Kagege's faint presence was
noticed, and Kagege was scouted to be a Special
Investigator for the Avaritia Trade Guild, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100111_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Kagege is now a subordinate of
Acting Chairman Nilny, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100111_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If Kagege works really hard at espionage,
Kagege could even become Chairman of
the Avaritia Trade Guild, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100111_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Then Kagege will pull the
strings from the shadows...
